```{r, include = FALSE}
author <- function(name, link=NULL) {
  list("name" = name,
       "link" = link)
}

render_authors <- function(authors, collapse=", ") {
  
  # convert links to markdown for anyone who has a link
  author_markdown <- lapply(authors, function(a) {
    if (is.null(a$link)) {
      a$name
    } else {
      paste0( "[", a$name, "](", a$link, ")" )
    }
  })
    # join the individual authors together using the collapse string
  paste(author_markdown, collapse=collapse)
}
```

::: {.section-authors}
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='as-is'}
author_list <- list(
  author("Katherine E.L. Cox", "katherinecox.github.io"),
  author("Frederick Tan")
)
render_authors(author_list, collapse=", ")
```
